mapper.sql: ol.id as ol_id, ol.user_id as ol_user_id, ol.operate_time as ol_operate_time, ol.title as ol_title, ol.server_path as ol_server_path, ol.servlet_path as ol_servlet_path, ol.method as ol_method, ol.response_status as ol_response_status, ol.response_millis as ol_response_millis, ol.client_ip as ol_client_ip, ol.client_device as ol_client_device, ol.client_os as ol_client_os, ol.client_browser as ol_client_browser, ol.client_browser_version as ol_client_browser_version, u.username as u_username, u.nickname as u_nickname
ol.headers as ol_headers, ol.parameters as ol_parameters, ol.payload as ol_payload

distinct
,
from sys_operation_log ol left join sys_history_user u on u.id = ol.user_id
order by ${orderByClause}
